I recently reformatted and now keep my music /collection/ on an external. But I also DJ, so I cruise music blogs and this and that for dowloads that I keep in idiotically organized folders ("maxchillin," "flyassshit," etc.).  But for day to day music while I work or when I want to play something for a friend, I'm all Rdio.
I do all my music from there, though.  Don't try to rip things onto my computer anymore.
I do use http://www.youtube.com/disco while I'm in the office. Simple, but nice.

Mixcloud for when i want a "real" DJ set. 8tracks for when i want a non-pro's mixtape love. Soundcloud for when i have the right energy to surf friends'/idols' one-offs and favorites. Also, Soundcloud is really fun for the Dashboard view of comments. And when you know the exact track you want, and only want... YouTube.
